value.name: Daisy Lopez, Columbiana, Ohio
value.description: Daisy Lopez, 85, a long-time resident of Campbell, passed away, Thursday, . She was born March 26, 1936, in Salinas, Puerto Rico, the daughter of Jose and Virginia Santiago Rivera. Daisy worked at Youngstown Towel Supply.
